snippet: Syracuse extended its home winning streak to 27 games, best in the nation, and won its 49th consecutive regular-season nonconference game.
abstract: College Basketball Men's Roundup; Syracuse defeats Long Beach State, 84-53; other men's and women's scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Syracuse extended its home winning streak to 27 games, best in the nation, and won its 49th consecutive regular-season nonconference game.

headline.seo: Syracuse Keeps Rolling at Home With Win vs. Long Beach State
headline.main: Syracuse Keeps Rolling at Home With a Blowout Against Long Beach State
headline.print_headline: Syracuse Keeps Rolling at Home With a Blowout Against Long Beach State
